markdownRemark.excerpt:

because I actually know js unlike go and because I’m interested in React. Having my site done in js helps in that…
markdownRemark.html:
I’m trying to move this blog over to gatsbyjs because I actually know js unlike go and because I’m interested in React.

Having my site done in js helps in that I can add demo apps and custom content to my site without having to wait for someone to do it or learning go. Plus React is rather unique so I would have to code in js for that to happen.

I actually wanted to code up a simple game and post it on my site but I could never figure out how to use custom content in hugo. I was going to code it in React anyway so might as well use it for my blog.

frontmatter.title: Gatsby Migration
frontmatter.description: Why am I moving to Gatsby?
